name: lister
description: AWS lambda to list all functions created in an AWS account
author: Gabriel Lebis

scripts.build:compile: tsc && cp package.json build && cp yarn.lock build && cd build && yarn --production --frozen-lockfile
scripts.build:add-deps: cp package.json build && cp yarn.lock build && cd build && yarn --production --frozen-lockfile
scripts.build: yarn build:compile && yarn build:add-deps && yarn build:package
